about_the_game:
about this game

This is the DLC of SchoolLife. Playing this game, you will experience the helplessness of Guo Zhiyuan's various strange behaviors, the final roar of a depressed patient, and the player's interaction with objects or people by moving around, thereby driving the development of the plot. This game can be said to be a Galgame without love elements, or it can be said to be a middle school student recalling the boring work of their school life. Guiyu High School is the worst school in Chaoshan, what would happen if I attended such a garbage high school.

To achieve the true ending, Guo Zhiyuan needs to be prevented from committing suicide

Character introduction

Guo Zhiyuan
It's still as stubborn as ever, it's an old fritter. After the retreat incident, it became even more lawless. I like to draw stickman comics
gyk
Guo Zhiyuan's classmate and friend also likes to draw stickman cartoons and worships Guo Zhiyuan as his teacher
xiaofu
The homeroom teacher of the first (2) class of high school treats the students disgustingl

Operating instructions

WASD for movement
Z Continue conversation/close
Left click on the mouse to select a conversation
Right shift to open menu
R interaction
I Open the item list
HOME Save
